bug.author: tom-doerr
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
According to the documentation (<denchmark-link:https://docs.ray.io/en/ray-0.3.1/rllib.html>https://docs.ray.io/en/ray-0.3.1/rllib.html</denchmark-link> ) it should be possible to evaluate models like so: <denchmark-code>python ray/python/ray/rllib/eval.py \ ~/ray_results/default/DQN_CartPole-v0_0upjmdgr0/checkpoint-1 \ --run DQN --env CartPole-v0 </denchmark-code>
but there is no script eval.py at that location or anywhere else in the ray repo.

comments.comment: For some reason I was reading the ray 0.3.1 documentation instead of latest.
